dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
April 13, 2012

Rapidgator.net DMCA Agent

The Blogger Team
Attn: blogger-support@google.com
Attn: blogger-legal@google.com
Attn: help@google.com

cc:  Ray Simon ray@belator.com <%20ray@belator.com>,  Don Mike
don.mike@belator.com, Nick Leoni nick.leoni@belator.com, Randall Whitely
randy@belator.com

*SUBJECT:**  13 April **2012** DMCA Notice 2 REPEAT INFRINGER*
*Re: Copyrighted Digital Content/Images/Video(s) found on **the **illegal
Google pirate blog http://purpleismnk.blogspot.com
** ** * *
The copyrighted work(s) at issue are the videos and images that appear on
http://members.randyblue.com
** ** *
I the undersigned, Media Abuse LLC (Herein known as OFFICIAL AGENT) certify
under penalty of perjury that I am the official agent authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of certain Intellectual Property Rights (Herein known
as MULTIMEDIA), for Belator, LLC/Ray Simon/RandyBlue.com (Herein known as
the PRODUCER.)

I have a good faith belief that the MULTIMEDIA listed below are not
authorized by the PRODUCER, its agent, and therefore infringes the
PRODUCER's rights according to state, federal, or United States copyright
law. Please act expeditiously to remove and disable access to the material
or items claimed to be infringing.
*
Identity of Multimedia owned by Producer Ray Simon/Belator, LLC/RandyBlue.
com found illegally hosted on the illegal Google pirate blog
http://bluemnk.blogspot.com
*

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification
is accurate and that for each MULTIMEDIA identified above, PRODUCER owns
the copyright solely and that I am the authorized OFFICIAL AGENT to act on
behalf of the PRODUCER and the infringed MULTIMEDIA.

*Please remove the digital media files within 24 hours, and respond back to
OFFICIAL Agent at *webmaster@mediaabusellc.com *with removal notice.
Failure to take these files down, and to remove them from the uploaded
sites may result in civil and/or criminal action against you; furthermore,
your lack of action will be considered 'contributory infringement'.*

PRODUCER/Copyright Owner: RandyBlue.com, Belator, LLC, Ray Simon, *11333

*This document, and any attachments thereto, is intended only for use by
